=======
History
=======

1.1.2 (2019-03-17)
------------------
* Brings this repo in sync with Paulo Herrera's old BitBucket and new GitHub
* Adds some new examples and fixes some compatibility issues with != None
* Vector image support for imagetoVTK
* Adds more tests to CI
* Adds "evtk" package (identical to "pyevtk") for backward compatibility with
  depricated warning

1.1.1 (2019-02-01)
------------------

* Makes sdist installable update CI infrastructure

1.1.0 (2017-08-03)
------------------

* Added unit-tests and Travis-CI integration.

1.0.2 (2017-07-25)
------------------

* Added Python3-compatible relative imports (PR by Rene Milk).

1.0.1 (2017-06-02)
------------------

* Ported over latest changes made in the original repo by Paulo Herrera.

0.1.0 (2014-09-05)
------------------

* First port of the original PyEVTK by Paulo Herrera.
